verses.verse: <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>stayed<s%> in <S%H7851>Shittim;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to play the <S%H2181>prostitute<s%> with the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab:<s%>

for they <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> to the <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of their <S%H430>gods;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H398>ate,<s%> and bowed <S%H7812>down<s%> to their <S%H430>gods.<s%>
<S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6775>joined<s%> himself to <S%H1187>Baal<s%> <S%H639>Peor:<s%> and the anger of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H3947>"Take<s%> all the <S%H7218>chiefs<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> and hang them <S%H3363>up<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> that the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> may turn <S%H7725>away<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"

<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H8199>judges<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H376>"Every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H2026>kill<s%> his <S%H582>men<s%> who have <S%H6775>joined<s%> themselves to Baal <S%H1187>Peor.<s%>"

<S%H376>Behold,<s%> one of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H7126>brought<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers<s%> a Midianite <S%H4084>woman<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> while they were <S%H1058>weeping<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting.<s%>

When <S%H6372>Phinehas,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H6965>it,<s%> he rose up from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> and <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H7420>spear<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand;<s%>

and he <S%H935>went<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> into the <S%H6898>pavilion,<s%> and <S%H1856>thrust<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them <S%H376>through,<s%> the man of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H413>through<s%> her <S%H6897>body.<s%> So the <S%H4046>plague<s%> was <S%H6113>stayed<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H6372>"Phinehas,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H499>Eleazar,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> has <S%H7725>turned<s%> my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> <S%H7725>away<s%> from the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> in that he was <S%H7065>jealous<s%> with my <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H3615>them,<s%> so that I didn't consume the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in my <S%H7068>jealousy.<s%>
Therefore <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H5414><s%> 'Behold, I give to him my <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H7965>peace:<s%>

and it shall be to <S%H2233>him,<s%> and to his seed <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1285>him,<s%> the covenant of an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H3550>priesthood;<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> he was <S%H7065>jealous<s%> for his <S%H430>God,<s%> and made <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>'"

Now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the man of <S%H376>Israel<s%> that was <S%H5221>slain,<s%> who was <S%H5221>slain<s%> with the Midianite <S%H4084>woman,<s%> was <S%H2174>Zimri,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5543>Salu,<s%> a <S%H5387>prince<s%> of a <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>house<s%> among the <S%H8099>Simeonites.<s%>

The <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H4084>Midianite<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> who was <S%H5221>slain<s%> was <S%H3579>Cozbi,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6698>Zur;<s%> he was <S%H7218>head<s%> of the <S%H523>people<s%> of a <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>house<s%> in <S%H4080>Midian.<s%>

for they <S%H6887>harassed<s%> you with their <S%H5231>wiles,<s%> with which they have <S%H5230>deceived<s%> you in the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of <S%H6465>Peor,<s%> and in the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of <S%H3579>Cozbi,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of the <S%H5387>prince<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian,<s%> their <S%H269>sister,<s%> who was <S%H5221>slain<s%> on the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H4046>plague<s%> in the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of <S%H6465>Peor.<s%>"
